resources.string: Deep in the Caribbean, Scabb Island
I\'m insulted you\'d even try to use that insult on me!
I hope this teaches you a lesson. Now SCRAM!
Wow! You\'re good enough to fight\nthe Sword Master!

string-array.name: pirate1_intro
string-array.item: I think I know how he must have felt.
Don\'t you have any NEW stories?
Uhm...
Err...
\"I\'m shaking, I\'m shaking.\"
\"How appropriate. You fight like a cow.\"

string-array.name: pirate2_intro
string-array.item: Yeah, if I hear this story one more time, I\'m gonna be crying myself.
Ehm...
Better this than the one about LeChuck...
Uhm...
\"I am rubber, you are glue.\"
\"How appropriate. You fight like a cow.\"

string-array.name: guybrush_intro
string-array.item: So I bust into the church and say, \"Now you\'re in for it, you bilious bag of barnacle bait!\"
...and then LeChuck cries,\"Guybrush! Have mercy!\"
\"I never deserved your Elain\'s hand\"
Of course!
Did I ever tell you how I defeated...
..the Sword Master of Mêlèe Island™
Capitain Smirk taught me the true secret of sword fighting!
He told me:
\"It\'s not always what you do, but what you say.\"
In short, the pros...
...they know just when to cut their opponent with an insult...
...one that catches \'em off guard.
Your wit\'s got to be twice as sharp as your sword!
Imagine this:
We\'re fighting up a storm...
There\'s a sudden break in the fighting and I say to you...
\"You fight like a dairy farmer.\"
You respond with?
No!
You should have responded with something like...
\"How appropriate. You fight like a cow.\"
You see?
It\'s razor-sharp wit like that, that wins fights!
Let\'s try another, I say...
\"Soon you\'ll be wearing my sword like a shish-kebab!\"
You respond with?
No! No! No!
That was the response from the last insult.
A correct response is:
\"First you\'d better stop waving it around like a feather-duster.\"
See?
..razor-sharp!
I said...
..I had to challenge many pirates...
..to learn the insults...
...to master this technique!
Hey! Where have you gone?
Tsk!
Those guys wouldn\'t know a good story even if they paid fifty bucks for it.
Oh well..
So?
No credits?
Aaaaaaand....NOW!
I\'ve never been able to predict when will the ending credits po..

string-array.name: pirate_intro
string-array.item: What ya be wantin\' ya scurvy lubber?
Aye, this better be importan\'.
Stoppin\' a pirate can be dangerous to yer health.
Move outta the way, or I cuts my way through!
Hey, are you the delivery boy I\'ve been waiting for hours?

string-array.name: guybrush_start_pirate
string-array.item: My name is Guybrush Threepwood. Prepare to die!
What are you?
Behind you! A three headed monkey!
Sorry to bother you. I\'ll be on my way.

string-array.name: pirate_start
string-array.item: Die? Don\'t make me laugh, my scar hurts..
I\'ve got an ugly face, i reek and i say Aaaaarrr. What am i?!
I heard he\'s got his own show in Disneyland™, nice attempt though..
Good, now get outta here noob.

string-array.name: guybrush_start_carla
string-array.item: My name is Guybrush Threepwood. Prepare to die!
I\'m sorry, I was following an old merchant and found myself here somehow.
I\'m selling these fine leather jackets.

string-array.name: carla_start_0
string-array.item: Nothing like being honest.
I doubt it... the stench that yokel leaves behind when he\'s around is very difficult to ignore.

string-array.name: carla_start_1
string-array.item: Do you have one in size 3?
Of course you don\'t!
Because you\'re not really a jacket salesman!

string-array.name: guybrush_answer_carla
string-array.item: I\'m back, and boy are you in trouble this time.
Yep, nailed it right on the head... gee, you\'re smart.

string-array.name: carla_answer
string-array.item: I can tell by the sarcastic expression on your face that you\'ve been fully trained by Captain Smirk.
Let me guess... you\'re here for The Three Trials down at the Scumm Bar?™?
You hope to become as disgusting as them, don\'t you?
Let\'s get this over with.

string-array.name: carla_lose
string-array.item: Well... I hope you\'re happy.
You can go back and brag to all your friends about how you beat the Sword Master.
You\'ll need proof...
Here, this should convince them.

string-array.name: insulti
string-array.item: You fight like a dairy farmer.
Soon you\'ll be wearing my sword like a shish kebab!
You\'re no match for my brains, you poor fool.
Nobody\'s ever drawn blood from me and nobody ever will!
I once owned a dog that was smarter than you.
You make me want to puke.
Have you stopped wearing diapers yet?
I\'m not going to take your insolence sitting down!
People fall at my feet when they see me coming.
This is the END for you, you gutter-crawling cur!
You have the manners of a beggar.
I got this scar on my face during a mighty struggle!
There are no words for how disgusting you are.
I\'ve heard you were a contemptible sneak.
My handkerchief will wipe up your blood!
I\'ve spoken with apes more polite than you.

string-array.name: insulti_plus
string-array.item: Boy are you ugly!
What an idiot!
I give up, you win!

string-array.name: insulti_mi3
string-array.item: Every enemy I\'ve met I\'ve annihilated!
You\'re as repulsive as a monkey in a negligee.
Throughout the Caribbean, my great deeds are celebrated.
En garde! Touché!
Coming face to face with me must leave you petrified!
Heaven preserve me! You look like something that\'s died!
I\'ll leave you devastated, mutilated and perforated.
I can\'t rest \'til you\'ve been exterminated!
Killing you would be justifiable homicide!
I have never seen such clumsy swordplay.
You\'re the ugliest monster ever created!
Would you like to be buried or cremated?
I\'ll hound you night and day!
You can\'t match my witty repartee!]
I\'ll skewer you, like a sow at a buffet!
When your father first saw you, he must have been mortified.

string-array.name: insultiCarla
string-array.item: I will milk every drop of blood from your body!
My tongue is sharper than any sword.
I\'ve got the courage and skill of a master swordsman!
No one will ever catch ME fighting as badly as you do.
Only once have I met such a coward!
If your brother\'s like you, better to marry a pig.
I hope you have a boat ready for a quick escape.
You are a pain in the backside, sir!
I usually see people like you passed-out on tavern floors.
I\'ve got a long, sharp lesson for you to learn today.
Every word you say to me is stupid.
My last fight ended with my hands covered with blood.
There are no clever moves that can help you now.
My sword is famous all over the Caribbean!
My name is feared in every dirty corner of this island!
Now I know what filth and stupidity really are.

string-array.name: insultiCarla_mi3
string-array.item: My attacks have left entire islands depopulated!
You have the sex appeal of a Shar-Pei.
My skills with a sword are highly venerated.
Your mother wears a toupee!
Never before have I faced someone so sissified.
Nothing on this earth can save your sorry hide!
I can\'t tell which of my traits has you the most intimidated.
Your stench would make an outhouse cleaner irritated!
When I\'m done, your body will be rotted and putrefied!
I have never lost a mêlée!
Your looks would make pigs nauseated.
I give you a choice. You can be gutted, or decapitated!
You\'ll find I\'m dogged and relentless to my prey!
Nothing can stop me from blowing you away!
Your lips look like they belong on the catch of the day.
You\'re a disgrace to your species, you\'re so undignified!

string-array.name: controInsulti
string-array.item: How appropriate. You fight like a cow.
First you\'d better stop waving it like a feather-duster.
I\'d be in real trouble if you ever used them.
You run THAT fast?
He must have taught you everything you know.
You make me think somebody already did.
Why, did you want to borrow one?
Your hemorrhoids are flaring up again, eh?
Even BEFORE they smell your breath?
And I\'ve got a little TIP for you. Get the POINT?
I wanted to make sure you\'d feel comfortable with me.
I hope now you\'ve learned to stop picking your nose.
Yes there are. You just never learned them.
Too bad no one\'s ever heard of YOU at all.
So you got that job as janitor, after all.
I\'m glad to hear you attended your family reunion.

string-array.name: ControInsulti_plus
string-array.item: Oh yeah?
I am rubber, you are glue.
I\'m shaking, I\'m shaking.
Uhh... Could you repeat that? I didn\'t quite get it.
I give up, you win!

string-array.name: controInsulti_mi3
string-array.item: With your breath, I\'m sure they all suffocated.
I look THAT much like your fiancée?
Too bad they\'re all fabricated.
Oh, that is so cliché!
Is that your face? I thought it was your backside.
The only way you\'ll be preserved is in formaldehyde.
Your odor alone makes me aggravated, agitated and infuriated.
Then perhaps you should switch to decaffeinated.
Then killing you must be justifiable fungicide.
You would have, but you were always running away.
If you don\'t count all the ones you\'ve dated.
With you around, I\'d prefer to be fumigated.
Then be a good dog. Sit! Stay!
I could, if you would use some breath spray.
When I\'m done with YOU, you\'ll be a boneless fillet.
At least mine can be identified.
